properties.name: maven.central.base-url
properties.description: The base URL for the Maven Central search API. Used for querying artifact and version information.

properties.name: maven.central.timeout
properties.description: The timeout duration for requests to the Maven Central API (e.g., '10s' for 10 seconds).

properties.name: maven.central.max-results
properties.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve per request from the Maven Central API.
